00010 #include "CoreUtils/selection.hpp"
00011 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00012 
00013 namespace isis
00014 {
00015 namespace util

00018 Selection::Selection( const char *entries ): m_set( 0 )
00019 {
00020     int id = 1;
00021     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::istring & ref, string2list<util::istring>( util::istring( entries ), ',' ) ) {
00022         const MapType::value_type pair( ref, id++ );
00023 
00024         if( ! ent_map.insert( pair ).second ) {
00025             LOG( Debug, error ) << "Entry " << util::MSubject( pair ) << " could not be inserted";
00026         }
00027     }
00028 }
00029 Selection::Selection(): m_set( 0 ) {}
00030 
00031 Selection::operator const int()const {return m_set;}
00032 Selection::operator const util::istring()const
00033 {
00034     BOOST_FOREACH( MapType::const_reference ref, ent_map ) {
00035         if ( ref.second == m_set )
00036             return ref.first;
00037     }
00038     return util::istring( "<<NOT_SET>>" );
00039 }
00040 Selection::operator const std::string()const
00041 {
00042     util::istring buff = *this;
00043     return std::string( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00044 }
00045 
00046 bool Selection::set( const char *entry )
00047 {
00048     MapType::const_iterator found = ent_map.find( entry );
00049 
00050     if ( found != ent_map.end() ) {
00051         m_set = found->second;
00052         return true;
00053     } else {
00054         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to set " << MSubject( entry ) << ", valid values are " << getEntries();
00055         return false;
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool Selection::operator==( const Selection &ref )const
00060 {
00061     return m_set == ref.m_set && ent_map == ref.ent_map;
00062 }
00063 bool Selection::operator==( const char ref[] ) const
00064 {
00065     return ( ( const util::istring & ) * this ) == ref ;
00066 }
00067 bool Selection::operator==( const int ref ) const
00068 {
00069     return ( ( int ) * this ) == ref;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 std::list<util::istring> Selection::getEntries()const
00074 {
00075     std::list<util::istring> ret;
00076     BOOST_FOREACH( MapType::const_reference ref, ent_map ) {
00077         ret.push_back( ref.first );
00078     }
00079     return ret;
00080 }
00081 }
